[[inst_sraiw]]
==== SRAIW

*Syntax:* sraiw SrcL, shamt, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Shift Right Arithmetic (preserves sign bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_sraiw.svg[SRAIW encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU
